DemoCharacter.name: DemoCharacter
DemoCharacter.description:
<c=cd6a00>DEMOCHARACTER</c>
This is a demo character. <c=boldPink>Am I cool or am I cool?</c>

Scarlet.name: Scarlet
Scarlet.description:
<c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c>
Your other pilot.
<c=ffda87>Riggs</c>' boyfriend from the <c=643264>fu</c><c=c864c8>tu</c><c=643264>re</c>?
His cards confer <c=keyword>unconventional movement</c> with an effective mix of <c=keyword>offensive</c> and <c=keyword>defensive</c> options.

BookOfTails.name: BOOK OF TAILS
BookOfTails.description: At start of turn, add a <c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Fox Tale</c> to your hand.

Counting.name: COUNTING
Counting.description: At start of turn, count sheeps. Once you counted 7 sheep, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY</c> and start counting again.

Cloak.name: CLOAK
Cloak.description: At start of turn, if you have 0 <c=status>FADE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>FADE</c>.

Dagger.name: DAGGER
Dagger.description: If you have <c=status>FADE</c>, all of your attacks pierces.

ElectrolyteSurge.name: ELECTROLYTE SURGE
ElectrolyteSurge.description:
Every two times your discard pile is shuffled back into your draw pile, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.
<c=downside>Caps at 1 per turn.</c>

SlowRoll.name: SLOW ROLL
SlowRoll.description: Draw an additional card after the first turn.

TrickAction.name: TRICK ACTION
TrickAction.description: If you end your turn with 0 <c=status>FADE</c>, gain 1 <c=status>FADE</c>.

CardEngine.name: CARD ENGINE
CardEngine.description:
Draw an additional card after the first turn.
Every <c=keyword>10th</c> time you draw a card in one turn, draw an additional card.

ReactionWheel.name: REACTION WHEEL
ReactionWheel.description:
Every <c=keyword>10th</c> time you draw a card, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.
<c=downside>Caps at 2 per turn.</c>

CloakAndDagger.name: CLOAK AND DAGGER
CloakAndDagger.description:
At the start of turn, gain 1 <c=status>FADE</c>.
If you have <c=status>FADE</c>, all of your attacks pierces.

HardlightAfterburners.name: HARDLIGHT AFTERBURNERS
HardlightAfterburners.description: At the start of combat, every two turns, gain 1 <c=status>HERMES</c>.

DemoShip.name: DemoShip
DemoShip.description:
This is a demo ship.
 <c=boldPink>Isn't this cool?</c>

description.None: Attack for set amount = 3. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.A: Attack for set amount = 4. On hit, apply 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.
description.B: Attack for set amount = 5. On hit, apply 2 <c=status>BOOST</c>.

ScarletEXE.name: Scarlet.EXE
ScarletEXE.description: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.
ScarletEXE.descA: Add 1 of 2 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.
ScarletEXE.descB: Add 1 of 3 <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=BC2C3D>SCARLET</c> cards to your hand.

AutododgeLeftNextTurn.name: Autododge Left Next Turn
AutododgeLeftNextTurn.description: At the start of next turn, gain <c=boldPink>{0}</c> <c=status>AUTODODGE LEFT</c>.

Fade.name: Fade
Fade.description: Next direct hit on this ship will force the other to move <c=movement>1</c> randomly instead. <c=ff687c>Decreases by 1 per instance or when you attack.</c>

TemporaryStrafe.name: Temporary Strafe
TemporaryStrafe.description: Fire for {0} damage immediately after every move you make. <c=downside>Goes away at start of next turn.</c>

TrickDagger_Missile.name: TRICK DAGGER
TrickDagger_Missile.description:
This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> damage.
Ignores all shields and armor.

TrickDagger_Seeker.name: TRICK DAGGER (SEEKER)
TrickDagger_Seeker.description:
This missile is going to deal <c=damage>2</c> damage.
Ignores all shields and armor.
<c=downside>It cannot miss!</c>
